snippet.title: "BOKURA" PS5/PS4 Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
"BOKURA"
Scheduled for release on Playstation5/4 on April 18, 2025
https://store.playstation.com/ja-jp/concept/10011351

BOKURA is a two-player puzzle adventure game. Play as two boys who ran away from their homes and work together to take yourselves somewhere far, far away. Relive the friendship of your childhood through the journey of two boys.

*****************************************************************************
Steam Store Page：https://store.steampowered.com/app/1801110
My Nintendo Store：https://store-jp.nintendo.com/list/software/70010000068759.html
App Store：https://apps.apple.com/app/id1605095285
Google Play：https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.kodansha.bokura
PlayStation Store：https://store.playstation.com/ja-jp/concept/10011351
